name: Buckrim
description: Buckrim is a proud, battle-ready Pokemon living in the forests. Its white armor gives it a sort of regal air, and it is often seen leading herds of other Pokemon. It is an expert in Petal Storm, using it to create a beautiful and powerful show of petals that strikes fear into the heart of its enemies. Buckrim spends its days grazing in lush meadows and showing off its special talents to its fellow Pokemon.
image_prompt: a young grass-type goat pokemon::1.8, wearing white armor, in a woods environment, green and teal ambient lighting, inked watercolor anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
